co.templex.banbot.discord

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.templex.banbot.discord.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
    Bot class, which is instantiated to create a controller for the Discord bot located in the Templex Discord.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private de.btobastian.javacord.DiscordAPI api
      The DiscordAPI instance for this bot.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService> exec
      This is the executor service which handles all IO from Discord.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger logger
      The logger instance for all instances of Bot.
      private LogWatcher logWatcher
      This is the log watcher instance which watches the specified logfile.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean shutdown
      A boolean representing the shutdown state of the bot.
      private java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch shutdownLatch
      Shutdown latch for the Bot instance.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.util.Calendar> startTime
      This is the calendar reference which marks the start time of the bot.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<de.btobastian.javacord.entities.Channel> targetChannel
      This is the channel which represents the "all staff" channel in Templex.

    • Field Detail

      • logger

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger logger
        The logger instance for all instances of Bot. This serves solely for debug purposes.

      • api

        private final de.btobastian.javacord.DiscordAPI api
        The DiscordAPI instance for this bot. Bots need one API instance per Bot instance.

      • targetServer

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<de.btobastian.javacord.entities.Server> targetServer
        This is the Server reference for the Templex Discord server. Note that this is held within an atomic reference for thread safety issues that may crop up later.

      • targetChannel

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<de.btobastian.javacord.entities.Channel> targetChannel
        This is the channel which represents the "all staff" channel in Templex. Note that this is held within an atomic reference for thread safety issues that may crop up later.

      • exec

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService> exec
        This is the executor service which handles all IO from Discord. Note that this is held within an atomic reference for thread safety issues that may crop up later.

      • targetServerID

        private final java.lang.String targetServerID
        TODO Document

      • targetChannelID

        private final java.lang.String targetChannelID
        TODO Document

      • logWatcher

        private LogWatcher logWatcher
        This is the log watcher instance which watches the specified logfile.

      • startTime

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.util.Calendar> startTime
        This is the calendar reference which marks the start time of the bot. Note that this is held within an atomic reference for thread safety issues that may crop up later.

      • shutdown

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean shutdown
        A boolean representing the shutdown state of the bot.

      • shutdownLatch

        private final java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch shutdownLatch
        Shutdown latch for the Bot instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bot

        public Bot(@NonNull
           java.util.Properties botProperties,
           @NonNull
           java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch shutdownLatch)
        Main constructor for the Bot class. A properties instance containing a valid Discord API token called "token".
        Parameters:
        botProperties - The properties for this Bot.
        shutdownLatch - The shutdown latch associated with this bot.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        private void destroy()
        Shutdown method for the bot. This should always be called upon shutdown.

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns the ready state of the bot. This isn't used by our Main, but may be by others.
        Returns:
        ready The ready state of the bot.

      • start

        public void start()
        Establishes and runs the bot, adding hooks into appropriate listeners. Note that there is quite a lot of background threading that occurs when the API is established successfully.

      • reportBan

        public void reportBan(java.lang.String banned,
                      java.lang.String banner,
                      java.lang.String reason)
        Reports a ban to the target server.

        Note that this will very likely change locations during the refactoring process.

        Parameters:
        banned - The banned user.
        banner - The banning user.
        reason - The reason for the ban.

      • reportPardon

        public void reportPardon(java.lang.String pardoned,
                         java.lang.String pardoner)
        Reports a pardon to the target server.

        Note that this will very likely change locations during the refactoring process.

        Parameters:
        pardoned - The pardoned user.
        pardoner - The pardoning user.
